item.title: Concert
item.description: Here is my upcoming concert information. Programs F. Liszt - O Lieb, so lang du lieben kannst Ch. Gounod - O Dieu, que de bijoux ‚,Faust“ G. Donizetti - Regnava nel Silenzio ,,Lucia di Lammermoor“ W. A. Mozart - O zittre nicht, mein lieber Sohn ,,Die Zauberflöte“ 김효근 - 내 영혼 바람되어 Location About programs “O lieb, so lang du lieben kannst”, originally a poem written by the revolutionary German poet, Ferdinand Freiligrath, was later made to music by the addition of a melody composed by the Hungarian Composer, Franz Liszt.
